error.post_too_large: The post contents are too large.
error.message_not_found: The specified message could not be found.
error.post_not_found: The corresponding post was not found.
error.deletion_not_permitted: The deletion of the corresponding post is not permitted.
error.posting_suspended: The posting function of this bulletin board is currently suspended.
error.admin_only: Only administrators are allowed to post to the bulletin board.
error.invalid_referer:
Posts cannot be made from any URLs besides
{url}.
error.too_many_characters: The are too many characters in the post contents.
error.too_many_linebreaks: There are too many line breaks in the post contents.
error.file_size_too_large: The overall file size of the post contents is too large.
error.name_too_long: There are too many characters in the name field. (Up to {max} characters)
error.email_too_long: There are too many characters in the email field. (Up to {max} characters)
error.title_too_long: There are too many characters in the title field. (Up to {max} characters)
error.post_interval_too_short: The time between posts is too short. Please try again.
error.log_size_limit: Message log file exceeds the file size limit
admin.password_setup_instruction:
Set your password.
Please enter the administrator password that you will use to administer the bulletin board from now on.
The password you enter here will be used for posting with the administrator's name, and for authenticating you when entering admin mode.
admin.password_generated:
Encrypted password generated!
Paste the following encrypted password string into the designated section of the main bulletin board script.
log.javascript_required: JavaScript is not available. Please enable JavaScript to use select/deselect all.
log.no_results: For "{query}" there were no results found.
admin.unauthorized_access: ACCESS BY UNAUTHORIZED PERSONNEL IS STRICTLY PROHIBITED. PERPETRATORS WILL BE TRACKED, LOCATED, AND DETAINED.
admin.deletion_instruction: Please check the checkboxes of the posts you wish to delete, then click the [Perform deletion] button at the bottom.
admin.deletion_header: Delete - View - Date posted - Subject - Username - Contents (truncated)
complete.return_instruction: Click the link above or press Alt(+Shift)+O to return to the bulletin board.
custom.gzip: Transfer using gzip compression (display will be faster)
custom.hide_form: Log-reading mode (will not display the post form)
custom.autolink: Auto-link URLs (URLs inside post contents will automatically become links when posted)
custom.cookie: Save your name and email address in a cookie when posting
custom.hide_links: Hide link row (will not display the list of links below the post form)
custom.followup_display: How to display the follow-up post page
custom.new_window: Open and display a new window
custom.bookmark_info: If you bookmark the URL that appears after you click "Register", you will be able to browse the bulletin board with the above settings.
custom.register_title: Save your settings and return to the bulletin board.
custom.restore_title: Delete all changes and return to the bulletin board.
tree.message_logs_title: Browse and search through old posts.
tree.standard_view_title: Display posts in the form of a stack-type bulletin board.
main.message_logs_title: Browse and search through old posts.

main.shown_posts: Shown above are posts %bindex% through %eindex%, in order of newest to oldest.
main.no_posts_below: There are no posts below this point.

form.name: Name
form.name_title: You can use a #trip, up to %maxlength% characters, Alt(+Shift)+1
form.title: Title
form.post_reload_title: Alt(+Shift)+P, if you click the post button without writing any contents, the page will reload instead
form.post_reload_title_r: Alt(+Shift)+R, if you click the post button without writing any contents, the page will reload instead
form.contents_help: (Up to %maxcol% columns and %maxline% lines. Please insert line breaks where appropriate. HTML/BBCode tags cannot be used.)
form.contents_help_image:
(Up to %maxcol% columns and %maxline% lines. Please insert line breaks where appropriate. HTML/BBCode tags cannot be used.
If you write %imagetext% in your text, the uploaded image will be inserted into that position.)
form.image_upload_help: JPG/GIF/PNG only. Max width %max_width%px; max height %max_height%px; max file size %max_size%KB.
form.message_logs_title: Browse and search through old posts.
form.author_help: List all posts made by the same user
form.thread_help: Display the reply chain as a thread
form.tree_help: Display the thread as a tree
form.undo_help: Delete the last post you made

stats.message_logs_title: Browse and search through old posts.
stats.author_title: List all posts made by the same user
stats.thread_title: Display the reply chain as a thread
stats.tree_title: Display the thread as a tree

tree.message_logs_title: Browse and search through old posts.
